title: Perfect Addiction
alternative_title: Chứng Nghiện Hoàn Hảo ; [비애] 퍼펙트 어딕션 ; อ้อนรักหนุ่มหน้าหวาน ; パーフェクトアディクション ; 澈底对你成瘾 ; 澈底對你成癮 ; 퍼펙트 어딕션
status: Chứng Nghiện Hoàn Hảo ; [비애] 퍼펙트 어딕션 ; อ้อนรักหนุ่มหน้าหวาน ; パーフェクトアディクション ; 澈底对你成瘾 ; 澈底對你成癮 ; 퍼펙트 어딕션
description:
Description :
        Akihito, a promiscuous, looks-obsessed college student, can't stand Sae, who has a beautiful face and a haughty attitude.
When he finds out that the girl he was aiming for at a group date is also after Sae, his irritation reaches its peak.
But later, Akihito bumps into Sae arguing with a man in the hotel district.
Sae is actually gay and a bottom, and he confides his worries that he can't seem to feel good during sex, which is a huge gap from his usual image.
This gets Akihito all hot and bothered, and he pushes Sae down. But as Sae unexpectedly responds with gusto, he finds it hard to hold back...?
An enemies to sex friends to lovers romance ♡
